fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Tome of Eternal Flow__
His Signature and his BiS.
__Sacrificial Jade__
Battle Pass weapon, but has everything he wants.
__Prototype Amber__
Craftable option that even heals his entire team.
__Ballad of the Boundless Blue__
An Event weapon, free to R5 but still worse than Prototype Amber.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Kagura's Verity, Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds, Jadefall's Splendor__ are all great options with pros and cons.

__Widsith__
Only viable if you are trying to speedrun and willing to optimize it further. 2 of the stats its passive gives is wasted but the other one (DMG%) benefits him greatly.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Thundersoother is only viable in an Electro-Charged team.
Because of how easy he can reach 100% CRIT Rate, CRIT DMG basically becomes a DMG% on him. So depending on the artifacts you may want to run HP% Circlet. 
With Furina its generally better to run HP% Goblet. Tho usually you dont want to run triple HP%, it is a viable option.
Even out of these contidions, HP% pieces can be better depending of the substats.
